text: 10.45-46: FG 2.4; 10.23; 11.18; 19.6; Ga 3.14Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar mben han zergim, mba Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui Zudaiŋ gumgi, mbe Pita phorga zegi. Mbe mba harigi gumgi gu mbigi mbararagim, mbe ŋguir kaa ga vhov Fhe Bakɨme zɨ ndi vun kuamkuagi. Mba Pita phorga zegi gumgi, mbe ŋgava mbatɨga muuŋgiap khaŋ nzuai, “Khar ganɨ. Fhe Bakɨme fhura won Ŋina Ŋaarar mba harigi ŋgui gumgi ga ndɨɨi.” Mbe maaŋ nzuaim, Pita khaŋ mbe nzuai,
